GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with optional sort/order queries applied

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article object with corresponding id
